content.question: Which of the following best explains the presence of the Spanish in the areas depicted on the map?

choices.label: The emergence of competition between European powers in the Americas
The outbreak of rebellion by the Pueblo Indians
The spread of maize culture from American Indians to the Spanish colonists
The introduction of African slavery to Spanish Florida

content.answer: The emergence of competition between European powers in the Americas

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
